overview_of_class: Foundational concerns and practices for screen-specific acting. Scenic analysis, rehearsal, staging and camera space, casting, editing for performance. Creating and portraying characters for most effective capture by the camera. Film directing techniques as related to the actor. Required introductory course for the Acting for the Screen module sequence.
name: Introduction to Acting for the Screen
title: SoC THEATRE 333-1-20 Introduction to Acting for the Screen
topic: Introduction to Acting for the Screen
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: PRE-REQ:  Reserved for students who have taken and passed RTVF 190.
